contexts.context: ...Shawn volunteers as the Outreach Coordinator for the California <mark>Coalition</mark> for Women Prisoners and advocates for incarcerated queer African...
...She also served on the steering committee of the <mark>coalition</mark> that secured enactment of the Dignity in All Schools...
